empoweringIndividuals: Empowering individuals through innovative sign language learning with AI-powered technology. Join thousands of learners mastering communication skills.
textToSignDescription: Convert text to sign language in real-time. Upload documents or use voice recording to extract meaningful words and learn their sign language equivalents.
animalsDescription: Learn dynamic animal signs through interactive lessons. Practice with cats, dogs, lions, and cows using hand gesture recognition technology.
staticSignsDescription: Master static signs through gamified learning. Complete challenges, track your progress, and compete on leaderboards with other learners.
trafficSignsDescription: Learn essential traffic signs and signals. Practice recognition and understanding of road safety signs through interactive lessons.
guardianDashboardDescription: Monitor your child's learning progress with detailed analytics, achievements tracking, and performance insights for parents and guardians.
learnStaticSignDescription: Learn static sign language through comprehensive lessons. Master hand gestures and finger spelling with step-by-step tutorials and practice exercises.
practiceStaticSignDescription: Test your static sign knowledge through interactive games. Use your webcam to practice hand gestures and get real-time feedback on your accuracy.
leaderboardDescription: View the leaderboard to see how you rank among other learners. Track your progress and compete with friends to stay motivated in your learning journey.
learnColorsDescription: Learn color signs through interactive lessons. Master the sign language for different colors with visual aids and practice exercises.
chatbotDescription: Chat with our AI-powered sign language assistant. Get help with signs, ask questions, and practice conversations in a supportive learning environment.
joinThousandsLearners: Join thousands of learners who are mastering sign language through our innovative AI-powered platform. Get real-time feedback, track your progress, and learn at your own pace.
helpLearnSignLanguage: I'm here to help you learn sign language and track your progress.
cameraPermissionDenied: Camera permission denied. Please allow camera access to use this feature.
cameraNotAvailable: Camera not available or access denied.
